alert.note: Alert for Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 2:57PM CST until January 09 at 3:45PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Wilcox County in south central Alabama... * Until 345 PM CST. * At 257 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Camden, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Wilcox County. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for south central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for south central Alabama.
